news.title: Second Gentoo BugDay to be held on September 6

body.p: Since last month's Gentoo BugDay was such a success, we're going to have another one next Saturday, on September 6, and on the first Saturday of each month from now on. Come on down to the #gentoo-bugs channel on irc.freenode.net, and help us squash bugs and maintain the high quality of our distribution - it's also a great opportunity for devs and users to get to know each other.
